title: Diamond Floral Studs - Blossom Sparkle
features: Contemporary floral design featuring four delicate petals outlined in shimmering diamonds. The central cluster of diamonds adds depth and brilliance. Secure post and friction back closure.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for loved ones. Adds a touch of elegance to any outfit.
description: The classic floral motif combined with the brilliance of diamonds makes these studs a timeless addition to your jewelry collection. The high-quality white gold setting ensures durability and lasting shine. Its versatile design is great for any occasion.
